overview: The Flight, is a fable about a girl named Athena (Holly Hubbell) who finds her courage to follow her beliefs. On an island surrounded by nothing but water, Athena lives under the oppressive regime of a post-apocalyptic society. Athena feels strangled by her community and the rigid expectations enforced in it. One fateful night Athena breaks in to her society's housing of censored old world artifacts. There, she finds a mysterious book with plans for a flying machine. This ignites the courage to risk everything to create the flying machine and seize her freedom.
tagline: You don't know and neither do they.
title: The Flight
